questions.text: Do you feel energized after socializing with a group?
Do you prefer deep conversations with one person over small talk with many?
Do you enjoy being the center of attention?
Do you need alone time to recharge after social events?
Do you prefer spontaneous outings or planned gatherings?
Do you focus more on concrete details or abstract ideas?
Do you trust facts more than gut feelings?
Do you enjoy thinking about future possibilities?
Do you prefer routines or new experiences?
Do you notice small changes in your environment quickly?
Do you prioritize logic over emotions when making decisions?
Do you find it easy to empathize with others' feelings?
Do you prefer constructive criticism over sugarcoated feedback?
Do you avoid conflicts to keep harmony?
Do you make decisions based on fairness over kindness?
Do you prefer to have things decided rather than leaving them open-ended?
Do you enjoy planning ahead for events?
Do you prefer to keep your options open rather than commit to a plan?
Do you feel comfortable with spontaneity in your schedule?
Do you prefer to finish tasks well in advance rather than at the last minute?

INTJ.title: The Architect
INTJ.description: Imaginative and strategic thinkers with a plan for everything. Independent and analytical, they thrive on logic and long-term vision.

INTP.title: The Logician
INTP.description: Innovative inventors with a thirst for knowledge. They love exploring abstract theories and solving complex problems.

ENTJ.title: The Commander
ENTJ.description: Bold, charismatic leaders who excel at organizing teams and achieving goals. They value efficiency and competence.

ENTP.title: The Debater
ENTP.description: Curious and quick-witted thinkers who love intellectual challenges. They enjoy exploring possibilities and debating ideas.

INFJ.title: The Advocate
INFJ.description: Quiet, idealistic visionaries driven by strong values. They seek meaning and strive to make a positive impact on the world.

INFP.title: The Mediator
INFP.description: Empathetic and creative souls who prioritize harmony. They’re deeply loyal to their beliefs and loved ones.

ENFJ.title: The Protagonist
ENFJ.description: Charismatic and inspiring leaders who motivate others. They’re passionate about helping people grow.

ENFP.title: The Campaigner
ENFP.description: Enthusiastic free spirits who see life as full of possibilities. They connect deeply with others and embrace change.

ISTJ.title: The Logistician
ISTJ.description: Practical, detail-oriented organizers who value responsibility. They thrive on order, rules, and reliability.

ISFJ.title: The Defender
ISFJ.description: Warm, dedicated protectors who quietly support others. They’re loyal, hardworking, and deeply caring.

ESTJ.title: The Executive
ESTJ.description: Efficient, traditional leaders who excel at managing people and processes. They value structure and accountability.

ESFJ.title: The Consul
ESFJ.description: Sociable, caring individuals who prioritize harmony. They’re excellent at organizing events and bringing people together.

ISTP.title: The Virtuoso
ISTP.description: Flexible problem-solvers who thrive on hands-on experimentation. They’re calm in crises and love mastering tools.

ISFP.title: The Adventurer
ISFP.description: Artistic, free-spirited explorers who live in the moment. They express themselves through creativity and action.

ESTP.title: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.description: Energetic risk-takers who love action and spontaneity. They’re quick thinkers and natural negotiators.

ESFP.title: The Entertainer
ESFP.description: Spontaneous, lively individuals who love being the center of attention. They bring joy and energy to every situation.
